form.name: uterus_hard_no_perineal_tears_greater_than_24_hours
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Mother: Soft Uterus, Perineal Tear> Uterus Hard, No Perineal Tears Greater Than 24 Hours

field.name: Uterus Hard, No Perineal Tears | Take Action
Advise client to go to a health center or hospital for her scheduled PNC visit with a midwife
Encourage client to pass urine regularly
Encourage client to eat and drink regularly
Keep mother and baby together, and advise mother on home care of the infant
Now examine client for any breast problems
